bibl.title: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, February 16, 1953

div1.p: Nogueira reports that he will continue searching for wood from Building No. 1, but thinks the pieces are lost.

div1.head: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, February 16, 1953
div1.opener:
DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219, MARIANAO
TELEFONO: B0-7577
Marianao Febrero 16 de 1953
Dr Philip Hench.
Mayo Clinic.-
Rochester, Minnessota
U.S.A.
Dear Philip:
div1.p:
Greetings for you and Mary hoping you both are well and
replying your letter dated 4th actual with regard to your wishes.

I enclose a copy of Mayor Orue photo unveiling Lazear bust.- Up t
to now I have not been able to get negatives of Dr Castro placing
flowers before Agramonte's memorial nor Dr Echeverria's before Carrol
but I expect to find it in short time, and then to mail you the pho-
tos.

From the hands of Mr Cesar Rodriguez I received your letters
where you ask for some photos, and here I send you two copies Dr
Castro's photos putting flowers on Lazear's and beside a copy of the
band of music and boys scouts. Together your Check, why we consider
it is not necessary you send us money for that.

John and I are looking for the woods from the caseta and I be-
lieve we dont have any hope finding the pieces you mentioned in your
letter, probably they are lost or somebody took them away, Anyhow, I
I wont give it up, I will continue looking for them with the same
interest.

I am thinking to send you some more photos of the same today
which I mail you, because up to now Mr Donato has not given me any
of them.

Philip, whatever you need, dont fail to ask for it, because
although I should delay in sending it, I am sure sooner or later
you will receive it.
